news.title: EUâ€™s New Digital Strategy Targets Data-Hoarding Tech Firms
news.description: Building on the regulations implemented under the GDPR in 2018, the EU seeks to further rein in data access and usage by tech giants, especially Facebook and Google.

news.title: The US is Charging Huawei With Racketeering
news.description: US officials have brought 16 charges against Huawei and related defendants, including conspiracy to violate the RICO Act, lying to federal investigators, and obstruction.
